extension.name: Membership Pro URLs Restriction
extension.author: Tuan Pham Ngoc
extension.license: GNU General Public License version 3, or later
extension.description: This plugin check to see whether users can access to an URL. Only publish it if you use Membership Pro URLS plugin to restrict access for members

field.name: redirect_url
field.label: Redirect URL
field.description: URL of the page users will be redirected to when they are not allowed to access to the restricted page

field.name: compare_method
field.label: Compare method
field.description: Choose method which will be used to compare the request URL with the URL which will be protected
field.option: Use Regular Expression (for advanced users who understand regular expression only)

field.name: display_urls_in_profile
field.label: Display Urls In Profile
field.description: If set to Yes, the list of urls which subscriber can access to will be displayed in his profile

field.name: show_on_frontend
field.label: Show On Frontend
field.description: If set to Yes, this plugin will be available on frontend add/edit plan form
